title: Looking for chill and friendly peeps to play with (Norms)
body:
Hey guys or 안녕 (annyeong) :D

Just looking for some peeps to play with in norms (preferably between unranked - silver; can't play high elo cause I'm unranked but I'm not limited to other ranks. For a bit of info, I'm mainly a bot lane person and jungler. My best champs for these three roles are:

Tristana (ADC)
Braum (Support)
Jarvan IV (Jungle, though a little rusty) and working on Nocturne as of now.

I am currently Unranked and intend on playing ranked this upcoming season and if u wanna join me, sure thing. If u have Discord, then here's my user, Tundradragon#6401 and a my Discord chat if u wish to join (which is League based), https://discord.gg/KHWQTZb.

Thank you guys :D

P.S If you get my K-Pop reference, you're awesome :D
